fashion_store_products.name: Designer Leather Handbag
fashion_store_products.description: Premium genuine leather handbag with gold-tone hardware. Perfect for professional and casual occasions.

fashion_store_products.name: Trendy Sunglasses
fashion_store_products.description: UV400 protection sunglasses with polarized lenses. Stylish frames suitable for all face shapes.

fashion_store_products.name: Statement Gold Necklace
fashion_store_products.description: Bold chunky chain necklace in gold finish. Makes a perfect statement piece for any outfit.

fashion_store_products.name: Silk Scarf Collection
fashion_store_products.description: Set of 3 premium silk scarves in different patterns. Versatile accessory for multiple styling options.

fashion_store_products.name: Vintage Style Watch
fashion_store_products.description: Classic analog watch with leather strap. Water-resistant with Japanese movement mechanism.

electronics_store_products.name: Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
electronics_store_products.description: True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation. 6-hour battery life with charging case.

electronics_store_products.name: Smartphone Stand Adjustable
electronics_store_products.description: Multi-angle aluminum phone stand compatible with all smartphones and small tablets.

electronics_store_products.name: Fast Charging Power Bank 20000mAh
electronics_store_products.description: High-capacity portable charger with USB-C PD and wireless charging. LED battery indicator.

electronics_store_products.name: USB-C to Lightning Cable 2m
electronics_store_products.description: MFi certified charging cable with braided nylon design. Fast charging and data sync support.

electronics_store_products.name: Bluetooth Speaker Waterproof
electronics_store_products.description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with IPX7 waterproof rating. 12-hour battery life and deep bass.

electronics_store_products.name: Wireless Charging Pad
electronics_store_products.description: 10W fast wireless charger compatible with all Qi-enabled devices. LED charging indicator.

demo_store_products.name: Premium Coffee Beans
demo_store_products.description: High-quality arabica coffee beans from Ethiopia. Medium roast with chocolate and citrus notes.

demo_store_products.name: Artisan Dark Chocolate
demo_store_products.description: Handcrafted dark chocolate with 70% cocoa content. Made with organic ingredients.

demo_store_products.name: Organic Wildflower Honey
demo_store_products.description: Pure wildflower honey from local beekeepers. Raw and unprocessed for maximum flavor.

product_creation.description: Test creating products using dummy data
steps: 2. Fill form with dummy product data
3. Submit and verify product appears in list
4. Check all fields are correctly saved
2. Verify only available products are shown

analytics_verification.description: Test analytics dashboard with product data

create_fashion_products: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/products/" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" -F "name=Designer Leather Handbag" -F "price=89.99" -F "description=Premium genuine leather handbag with gold-tone hardware. Perfect for professional and casual occasions." -F "is_available=true"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/products/" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" -F "name=Trendy Sunglasses" -F "price=25.50" -F "description=UV400 protection sunglasses with polarized lenses. Stylish frames suitable for all face shapes." -F "is_available=true"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/products/" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" -F "name=Statement Gold Necklace" -F "price=35.75" -F "description=Bold chunky chain necklace in gold finish. Makes a perfect statement piece for any outfit." -F "is_available=true"
create_electronics_products: curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/products/" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" -F "name=Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds" -F "price=79.99" -F "description=True wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation. 6-hour battery life with charging case." -F "is_available=true"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/products/" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" -F "name=Smartphone Stand Adjustable" -F "price=18.99" -F "description=Multi-angle aluminum phone stand compatible with all smartphones and small tablets." -F "is_available=true"

curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/api/products/" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN" -F "name=Fast Charging Power Bank 20000mAh" -F "price=55.50" -F "description=High-capacity portable charger with USB-C PD and wireless charging. LED battery indicator." -F "is_available=true"

preparation: 1. Ensure both servers are running (backend on :8000, frontend on :5173)
2. Register test users using dummy_users.json data
4. Prepare product data from this file
execution: 1. Create products using frontend product modal
2. Verify products appear in vendor dashboard
validation: 1. All products display with correct information
4. Public storefront shows only available products

notes: Generated on July 31, 2025 for QuickVendor product testing
Product prices are in USD but can be displayed in any currency
All dummy data is fictional and for testing purposes only
Categories and tags can be used for future filtering features
Some products are marked as unavailable to test stock management
Use YOUR_TOKEN placeholder in curl commands - replace with actual JWT token
